AV System (AVS)
[Core Modules]

Detailed Description

Exposes an Isochronous Interface configuration API for stream format, direction, isoc channel, packet size, etc.

This module can be used from the command prompt by the cli_avs commands.

An Isoc Channel is a 1394 channel, allocated from the Resource Manager using CMP, usually via AV/C CONNECT commands.

These functions are typically used by CMP and AV/C stream control.


Modules

 AVS Internal
 Module Initialization
 Initialization of the AVS module.
 Stream Control
 Provides control of AVS streaming, channels, formats, and sample rates.
 AVS Format
